meanings.definition: An unincorporated community in Freestone County, Texas, United States.
meanings.english_definition: An unincorporated community in Freestone County, Texas, United States.

etymology.value: The surname Kirvin is of Irish origin, derived from the Gaelic Ó Ciarbháin, meaning "descendant of Ciarbhán". The personal name Ciarbhán is a diminutive of Ciarbh, meaning "dark" or "black".
